Get a specific data series from ARAD

arad_get_series.Rd

Convenience function to retrieve a single data series and optionally filter by specific criteria.

Usage

arad_get_series(
  indicator_id,
  filter_month = NULL,
  filter_year = NULL,
  api_key = NULL,
  rename_value = NULL
)

Arguments

indicator_id

Single indicator ID

filter_month

Numeric, filter data for specific month (1-12)

filter_year

Numeric, filter data for specific year

api_key

API key for ARAD access

rename_value

Character, new name for the value column

Value

A data frame with the requested series

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Get December data for all years
dec_data <- arad_get_series("SRUMD08402C", filter_month = 12)

# Get data for 2023 and rename value column
data_2023 <- arad_get_series("SRUMD08402C", filter_year = 2023, 
                             rename_value = "spending")
} # }
